verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> be unto the pastors <WH7462> <WH8802> that destroy <WH6> <WH8764> and scatter <WH6327> <WH8688> the sheep <WH6629> of my pasture <WH4830> ! saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> against the pastors <WH7462> <WH8802> that feed <WH7462> <WH8802> my people <WH5971>; Ye have scattered <WH6327> <WH8689> my flock <WH6629>, and driven them away <WH5080> <WH8686>, and have not visited <WH6485> <WH8804> them: behold, I will visit <WH6485> <WH8802> upon you the evil <WH7455> of your doings <WH4611>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

And I will gather <WH6908> <WH8762> the remnant <WH7611> of my flock <WH6629> out of all countries <WH776> whither I have driven <WH5080> <WH8689> them, and will bring them again <WH7725> <WH8689> to their folds <WH5116>; and they shall be fruitful <WH6509> <WH8804> and increase <WH7235> <WH8804>.

And I will set up <WH6965> <WH8689> shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> over them which shall feed <WH7462> <WH8804> them: and they shall fear <WH3372> <WH8799> no more, nor be dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735>, neither shall they be lacking <WH6485> <WH8735>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

Behold, the days <WH3117> come <WH935> <WH8802>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that I will raise <WH6965> <WH8689> unto David <WH1732> a righteous <WH6662> Branch <WH6780>, and a King <WH4428> shall reign <WH4427> <WH8804> and prosper <WH7919> <WH8689>, and shall execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgment <WH4941> and justice <WH6666> in the earth <WH776>.

In his days <WH3117> Y'hudah <WH3063> shall be saved <WH3467> <WH8735>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> safely <WH983>: and this is his name <WH8034> whereby he shall be called <WH7121> <WH8799>, THE YY OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS <WH3072>.

Therefore, behold, the days <WH3117> come <WH935> <WH8802>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that they shall no more say <WH559> <WH8799>, The YY <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, which brought up <WH5927> <WH8689> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>;

But, The YY <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, which brought up <WH5927> <WH8689> and which led <WH935> <WH8689> the seed <WH2233> of the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of the north <WH6828> country <WH776>, and from all countries <WH776> whither I had driven <WH5080> <WH8689> them; and they shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> in their own land <WH127>.

Mine heart <WH3820> within <WH7130> me is broken <WH7665> <WH8738> because of the prophets <WH5030>; all my bones <WH6106> shake <WH7363> <WH8804>; I am like a drunken <WH7910> man <WH376>, and like a man <WH1397> whom wine <WH3196> hath overcome <WH5674> <WH8804>, because <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>, and because of the words <WH1697> of his holiness <WH6944>.

For the land <WH776> is full <WH4390> <WH8804> of adulterers <WH5003> <WH8764>; for because <WH6440> of swearing <WH423> the land <WH776> mourneth <WH56> <WH8804>; the pleasant places <WH4999> of the wilderness <WH4057> are dried up <WH3001> <WH8804>, and their course <WH4794> is evil <WH7451>, and their force <WH1369> is not right.

For both prophet <WH5030> and Kohen <WH3548> are profane <WH2610> <WH8804>; yea, in my house <WH1004> have I found <WH4672> <WH8804> their wickedness <WH7451>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

Wherefore their way <WH1870> shall be unto them as slippery <WH2519> ways in the darkness <WH653>: they shall be driven on <WH1760> <WH8735>, and fall <WH5307> <WH8804> therein: for I will bring <WH935> <WH8686> evil <WH7451> upon them, even the year <WH8141> of their visitation <WH6486>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

And I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> folly <WH8604> in the prophets <WH5030> of SHomron <WH8111>; they prophesied <WH5012> <WH8694> in Baal <WH1168>, and caused my people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478> to err <WH8582> <WH8686>.

I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> also in the prophets <WH5030> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> an horrible thing <WH8186>: they commit adultery <WH5003> <WH8800>, and walk <WH1980> <WH8800> in lies <WH8267>: they strengthen <WH2388> <WH8765> also the hands <WH3027> of evildoers <WH7489> <WH8688>, that none <WH376> doth return <WH7725> <WH8804> from his wickedness <WH7451>: they are all of them unto me as Sodom <WH5467>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> thereof as Gomorrah <WH6017>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> concerning the prophets <WH5030>; Behold, I will feed <WH398> <WH8688> them with wormwood <WH3939>, and make them drink <WH8248> <WH8689> the water <WH4325> of gall <WH7219>: for from the prophets <WH5030> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> is profaneness <WH2613> gone forth <WH3318> <WH8804> into all the land <WH776>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, Hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> not unto the words <WH1697> of the prophets <WH5030> that prophesy <WH5012> <WH8737> unto you: they make you vain <WH1891> <WH8688>: they speak <WH1696> <WH8762> a vision <WH2377> of their own heart <WH3820>, and not out of the mouth <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>.

They say <WH559> <WH8802> still <WH559> <WH8800> unto them that despise <WH5006> <WH8764> me, The YY <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765>, Ye shall have peace <WH7965>; and they say <WH559> <WH8804> unto every one that walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> after the imagination <WH8307> of his own heart <WH3820>, No evil <WH7451> shall come <WH935> <WH8799> upon you.

For who hath stood <WH5975> <WH8804> in the counsel <WH5475> of the YY <WH3068>, and hath perceived <WH7200> <WH8799> and heard <WH8085> <WH8799> his word <WH1697>? who hath marked <WH7181> <WH8689> his word <WH1697>, and heard <WH8085> <WH8799> it ?

Behold, a whirlwind <WH5591> of the YY <WH3068> is gone forth <WH3318> <WH8804> in fury <WH2534>, even a grievous <WH2342> <WH8711> whirlwind <WH5591>: it shall fall grievously <WH2342> <WH8799> upon the head <WH7218> of the wicked <WH7563>.

The anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> shall not return <WH7725> <WH8799>, until he have executed <WH6213> <WH8800>, and till he have performed <WH6965> <WH8687> the thoughts <WH4209> of his heart <WH3820>: in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117> ye shall consider <WH995> <WH8709> it perfectly <WH998>.
I have not sent <WH7971> <WH8804> these prophets <WH5030>, yet they ran <WH7323> <WH8804>: I have not spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> to them, yet they prophesied <WH5012> <WH8738>.

But if they had stood <WH5975> <WH8804> in my counsel <WH5475>, and had caused my people <WH5971> to hear <WH8085> <WH8686> my words <WH1697>, then they should have turned <WH7725> <WH8686> them from their evil <WH7451> way <WH1870>, and from the evil <WH7455> of their doings <WH4611>.
Am I a 'Elohim <WH430> at hand <WH7138>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, and not a 'Elohim <WH430> afar off <WH7350> ?

Can any <WH376> hide <WH5641> <WH8735> himself in secret places <WH4565> that I shall not see <WH7200> <WH8799> him? saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>. Do not I fill <WH4392> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>? saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> what the prophets <WH5030> said <WH559> <WH8804>, that prophesy <WH5012> <WH8737> lies <WH8267> in my name <WH8034>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I have dreamed <WH2492> <WH8804>, I have dreamed <WH2492> <WH8804>.

How long shall this be <WH3426> in the heart <WH3820> of the prophets <WH5030> that prophesy <WH5012> <WH8737> lies <WH8267>? yea, they are prophets <WH5030> of the deceit <WH8649> of their own heart <WH3820>;

Which think <WH2803> <WH8802> to cause my people <WH5971> to forget <WH7911> <WH8687> my name <WH8034> by their dreams <WH2472> which they tell <WH5608> <WH8762> every man <WH376> to his neighbour <WH7453>, as their fathers <WH1> have forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> my name <WH8034> for Baal <WH1168>.

The prophet <WH5030> that hath a dream <WH2472>, let him tell <WH5608> <WH8762> a dream <WH2472>; and he that hath my word <WH1697>, let him speak <WH1696> <WH8762> my word <WH1697> faithfully <WH571>. What is the chaff <WH8401> to the wheat <WH1250>? saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.
Is not my word <WH1697> like <WH3541> as a fire <WH784>? saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>; and like a hammer <WH6360> that breaketh <WH6327> the rock <WH5553> in pieces <WH6327> <WH8787> ?
Therefore, behold, I am against the prophets <WH5030>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that steal <WH1589> <WH8764> my words <WH1697> every one <WH376> from his neighbour <WH7453>.
Behold, I am against the prophets <WH5030>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that use <WH3947> <WH8802> their tongues <WH3956>, and say <WH5001> <WH8799>, He saith <WH5002> <WH8803>.

Behold, I am against them that prophesy <WH5012> <WH8737> false <WH8267> dreams <WH2472>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, and do tell <WH5608> <WH8762> them, and cause my people <WH5971> to err <WH8582> <WH8686> by their lies <WH8267>, and by their lightness <WH6350>; yet I sent <WH7971> <WH8804> them not, nor commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> them: therefore they shall not profit <WH3276> <WH8686> this people <WH5971> at all <WH3276> <WH8687>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

And when this people <WH5971>, or the prophet <WH5030>, or a Kohen <WH3548>, shall ask <WH7592> <WH8799> thee, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What is the burden <WH4853> of the YY <WH3068>? thou shalt then say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, What burden <WH4853>? I will even forsake <WH5203> <WH8804> you, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

And as for the prophet <WH5030>, and the Kohen <WH3548>, and the people <WH5971>, that shall say <WH559> <WH8799>, The burden <WH4853> of the YY <WH3068>, I will even punish <WH6485> <WH8804> that man <WH376> and his house <WH1004>.

Thus shall ye say <WH559> <WH8799> every one <WH376> to his neighbour <WH7453>, and every one <WH376> to his brother <WH251>, What hath the YY <WH3068> answered <WH6030> <WH8804>? and, What hath the YY <WH3068> spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> ?

And the burden <WH4853> of the YY <WH3068> shall ye mention <WH2142> <WH8799> no more: for every man's <WH376> word <WH1697> shall be his burden <WH4853>; for ye have perverted <WH2015> <WH8804> the words <WH1697> of the living <WH2416> 'Elohim <WH430>, of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> our 'Elohim <WH430>.
Thus shalt thou say <WH559> <WH8799> to the prophet <WH5030>, What hath the YY <WH3068> answered <WH6030> <WH8804> thee? and, What hath the YY <WH3068> spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> ?

But <WH518> since ye say <WH559> <WH8799>, The burden <WH4853> of the YY <WH3068>; therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; Because ye say <WH559> <WH8800> this word <WH1697>, The burden <WH4853> of the YY <WH3068>, and I have sent <WH7971> <WH8799> unto you, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye shall not say <WH559> <WH8799>, The burden <WH4853> of the YY <WH3068>;

Therefore, behold, I, even I, will utterly <WH5377> <WH8800> forget <WH5382> <WH8804> you, and I will forsake <WH5203> <WH8804> you, and the city <WH5892> that I gave <WH5414> <WH8804> you and your fathers <WH1>, and cast you out of my presence <WH6440>:
And I will bring <WH5414> <WH8804> an everlasting <WH5769> reproach <WH2781> upon you, and a perpetual <WH5769> shame <WH3640>, which shall not be forgotten <WH7911> <WH8735>.
